abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web looking for the most interesting, insightful and just plain odd news that might otherwise go unnoticed and unremarked. This morning brings a video of a precocious child who wows his audience, British attempts to recreate Silicon Valley and the patent for teasing a cat with a laser pen.

lead_paragraph: Here’s what the reporters and editors of the New York Times tech staff found on the Web. The full Scuttlebot feed is on this page in the right-hand column.
